name: My Favorite Guard
description:
A widescale attack on the mothership of the Gemini has forced Propus, a guard to the prince of the Gemini, to evacuate with the young prince Castor. Castor, however, is mad Propus left behind his favorite guard and has locked him in the maintenance room of the escape pod with no way to get out.

--

A short visual novel made in only a week for the Only One of Any Asset (O2A2) Jam in 2022, where the rules limit you to only have one bg, one sprite, one music track, and so on. There is only one ending.

Content Warnings

Briefly mentions grief and death.

Credits

Coding, Writing, Art, Sound Effect by Appel (me.)

Music by Presence of Music.

Caption Tool by npckc.

Big thanks to my testers Ronove, Eerie, and Pascal overall and for finding some embarassing typos.
